Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill for the transfer of certain interests in lands in Dona Ana County, New Mexico, to New Mexico State University, Las Cruces, New Mexico.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the New Mexico State University at Las Cruces, all Federal right title and interest in specified lands in Dona Ana County, New Mexico, at the cost of $2.50 an acre. Reserves the Federal right to prospect, remove and mine all minerals in such specified lands. Requires reversion of title immediately to the United States if the lands are used for purposes other than specified agricultural research.

titles.title: A bill for the transfer of certain interests in lands in Dona Ana County, New Mexico, to New Mexico State University, Las Cruces, New Mexico.
